works.description: Summer time is here, and so is the time to plan your outdoor adventures and beach parties. And, if you are a water sports lover, Waterpillar is an exciting new water sports invention for you to take the plunge this season! This unique pedal-powered watercraft is designed to move quickly and smoothly across the water. The waterpillar-aka-water cycle is made with molded plastic tires, an anodized aluminum frame, and a sturdy belt drive, and can accommodate two adults, and is even children over the age of 8 years. One person can easily operate it as by two
